PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DamperTypeFireSmokeDamper
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Combination Fire and Smoke damper type attributes. New Pset in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum.

PropertyDef.Name: ControlType
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of control used to operate the damper (e.g., Open/Closed Indicator, Resetable Temperature Sensor, Temperature Override, etc.)
